title: GDMBR, 2019
description: Images captured between Canada and Mexico along the spine of the Rockies.

images.title: Red Meadow Lake
images.description: The view from our tent at Red Meadow Lake above Whitefish, MT.

images.title: Red Meadow Lake 2
images.description: An unusual color cast over the mountain after a raging hail storm.

images.title: Atop Stemple Pass
images.description: My reward for a grueling climb. An increible view followed by a white-knuckle descent.

images.title: Gravelly Range Road
images.description: A fire detour sent me down this incredible road.

images.title: Gravelly Range Road 2
images.description: Just before arriving at the warmest hospitality of Barbara Nye and John Keller.

images.title: Outside South Pass City, WY
images.description: Captured just before arriving in the collapsed mining town of South Pass City, followed by Atlantic City.

images.title: Outside South Pass City, WY 2
images.description: Boundless nothingness.

images.title: Coulter Bay
images.description: A 10-stop ND captures movement in the clouds above the Tetons.

title: Colombia, 2019

images.description: One of the most unique sights I've ever seen.

images.title: In the Clouds
images.description: Looking back down from the heavens.

images.title: Finca Argentina
images.description: Our farmstay the day before the ascent up to 16,000'.

images.title: Bikers
images.description: Sending a corner in the night.

images.title: Roots
images.description: Enormous buttress roots on the floor of the Amazon.

images.title: 99 Pesos
images.description: A bustling marketplace in Medellin.

images.title: Helping Hand
images.description: A parent and child pass beneath a bridge.
